name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 9, a video in which Hua Chunying said, "Without the Communist Party, there would be no New China. This is the common belief of the Chinese people," was widely criticized, with nearly 70,000 netizens collectively mocking it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In recent days, Yang Nan, the former chairman of the Henan Football Association, who is in Canada, has published several long articles on Weibo, publicly disclosing the inside story of the Football Association's anti-corruption efforts.
In November 2023, Yang Nan, the former chairman of the Henan Football Association, was investigated for suspected major crimes and was removed from his position in the Henan Football Association.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 9, a hearing on the tap water price reform plan for the central urban area of Guangzhou was held. Among the 17 participants in the hearing, 9 supported Plan 1, which is to increase the first-tier water price for residential water from 1.98 yuan/m³ to 2.6 yuan/m³.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequently, the document is set with permissions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 7, villagers in Xiqiao West Bank, Nanhai, Foshan, Guangdong, held a two-day rights protection rally in front of West Bank Assets Co., Ltd., chanting the slogan "Throw away your fantasies and pick up hoes to protect your rights."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After a vicious stabbing incident in Zhenxiong, Yunnan, which left 21 injured and 2 dead, local parents began to pick up their children from school with sticks

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At about 1:30 pm on May 10, a primary school bus in Nantong City, Jiangsu Province collided with a dump truck while passing an intersection. The police report said that one person was in critical condition, one was seriously injured, and six were slightly injured.
It is reported that the bus was carrying children to a nearby primary school to participate in a performance.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 10, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, villagers in Hengsha Village shouted “Give me back my house and my relocation fee” outside the local Party and Mass Service Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 10, the Chengdu Hi-Tech Zone Anti-Fraud Joint Office once again notified parents and teachers to promptly check whether their children’s mobile phones have WhatsApp and other software.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Mother's Day slogan of Blue Moon laundry detergent, "Let mom wash clothes more easily, save effort, and worry less", has caused public controversy. On May 9, a Beijing netizen found that the advertisement was boycotted in an elevator.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the video has been taken down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The scene was cordoned off by special police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The parents questioned the school outside the emergency room why they did not notify the parents, saying that they rushed to the hospital only after being notified by other parents. There were a large number of police officers around the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Nantong residents said that the traffic lights on the road where the accident occurred had been broken for two days without repair, and no temporary traffic lights were set up. This may be the main cause of the accident.
On that day, the Chongchuan District Education Bureau organized a cultural and artistic activity. When the accident happened, the bus was carrying children back to the performance site after lunch at school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 10, in Chengdu, Sichuan, a man was dissatisfied with the traffic police's punishment and bought a kitchen knife on the street to chase and hack at the traffic police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident, special police closed the road and urgently repaired the traffic lights on site.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 9, several Teslas were stopped on the Zhongzhou Avenue overpass in Zhengzhou, Henan Province for unknown reasons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A staff member of the Traffic Police Brigade of the Nantong Public Security Bureau responded to a reporter from China Newsweek that relevant departments are still investigating whether the cause of the accident was a problem with the traffic light, and that "traffic on the road section where the accident occurred has been evacuated."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 10, Shaoguan, Guangdong. It was reported online that a school leader of Renhua Middle School exploited students, occupied the students' only half-day vacation to hold a parent meeting, and made students run exercises many times.
A teacher spoke up in the class teacher group because he felt sorry for the students. As a result, he was not only kicked out of the group, but also criticized by the leader.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of May 2, a student from Wuhan Institute of Design and Engineering jumped off a building. It is suspected that she suffered from long-term school bullying. However, her parents only learned about her daughter's death a week later (May 9). After arriving at the school, they were unable to see the school leaders or contact her classmates.
Previously, the school's counselor had informed students that if an accident occurred, they should call the school security department first, and not call the police, otherwise they would face punishment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 9, a murder occurred in Building 3 of the East Campus of Zhengzhou Institute of Aeronautical Industry Management. The specific cause is currently unknown.
Students at the scene said that the row of dormitories was sealed off for a period of time after the incident, and some students who took photos were called away by the police for a talk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 9, in Shuozhou, Shanxi, a woman posted a video saying that her child was in the second grade of Yuanbo Middle School. On April 28, she received a call from the head teacher and learned that the child had an accident. After rushing to the hospital, she was told that the child had died and there were deep marks on his neck.
The woman said that she was beaten by local police when she was defending her rights at school on May 9.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 9, Zhengzhou, Henan. Vanke Real Estate owed wages to migrant workers, and the workers held banners and national flags outside the developer's door to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, a large number of parents are gathering in front of the gate of Tonghe Primary School where the Nantong primary school bus accident occurred.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The floor of the hospital where the children are being rescued has been closed.

content: On the evening of May 10, at the Qingdao Hainiu vs. Nantong Zhiyun match, all fans pointed their hands to the sky and prayed for the children in the Nantong bus accident.
